name: Blanched
description:
Puzzle-Platformer

In a world where color is everything watch as all is taken away from you. Find your way through levels as you gather spots of color that give the levels meaning again or at least a way out. Jump, duck, and run around the different sections as you gather back the colors that gave this world meaning once more in order to bring back the beauty lost by being blanched. ( Just a small side project)
